name: Disciples of Sanctus Medicus: Internal Alchemist

skills.name: Seeding Core
skills.desc: Inflicts a single target with Spur of Thunderwoe.

skills.name: Thundering Reign
skills.desc: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Core Rupture
skills.desc: Upon receiving a killing blow, this unit deals Lightning DMG to any targets that were inflicted with Spur of Thunderwoe by them. Afterward, Spur of Thunderwoe on these targets will be removed.
